string_definition.sDescriptor: Yaris deal reduced damaged against armored enemies.
string_definition.sDisplayString: Yaris deal reduced damaged against armored enemies.

string_definition.sDescriptor: Deals double damage against blocking enemies, but fires slower.
string_definition.sDisplayString: Deals double damage against blocking enemies, but fires slower.

string_definition.sDescriptor: Explodes upon impact, dealing 60 points of non-elemental damage.
string_definition.sDisplayString: Explodes upon impact, dealing 60 points of non-elemental damage.

string_definition.sDescriptor: Explodes 3 seconds after being fired into a surface, dealing 150 points of non-elemental damage.
string_definition.sDisplayString: Explodes 3 seconds after being fired into a surface, dealing 150 points of non-elemental damage.

string_definition.sDescriptor: Deals 6 points of bleeding damag per second over 8 seconds, and slows the target down by 20%.
string_definition.sDisplayString: Deals 6 points of bleeding damag per second over 8 seconds, and slows the target down by 20%.

string_definition.sDescriptor: Explodes upon impact, dealing 30 points of frost damage.
string_definition.sDisplayString: Explodes upon impact, dealing 30 points of frost damage.

string_definition.sDescriptor: Explodes upon impact, dealing 30 points of fire damage.
string_definition.sDisplayString: Explodes upon impact, dealing 30 points of fire damage.

string_definition.sDescriptor: Explodes upon impact, dealing 30 points of shock damage.
string_definition.sDisplayString: Explodes upon impact, dealing 30 points of shock damage.

string_definition.sDescriptor: Emits sound upon impact, distracting enemies.
string_definition.sDisplayString: Emits sound upon impact, distracting enemies.

string_definition.sDescriptor: Has a 50% increased chance to stagger, and a 25% chance to strike the target down.
string_definition.sDisplayString: Has a 50% increased chance to stagger, and a 25% chance to strike the target down.

string_definition.sDescriptor: Doubles spell casting cost and drains 10 points of Magicka per second for 10 seconds.
string_definition.sDisplayString: Doubles spell casting cost and drains 10 points of Magicka per second for 10 seconds.

string_definition.sDescriptor: Explodes upon impact, dealing 30 points of shock damage.
string_definition.sDisplayString: Explodiert und fuegt allen Gegnern im Einflussbereich 30 Punkte Elektrizitätsschaden zu.

string_definition.sDescriptor: Explodes upon impact, dealing 60 points of non-elemental damage.
string_definition.sDisplayString: Explodiert und fuegt allen im Einflussbereich 60 Punkte nicht-elementaren Schaden zu.

armor_material.sMaterialName: Wrath Barbut of the Divine Guardian
Wrath Great Helm of the Divine Guardian
